radiographic_examinations.findings: Ascites, hepatofugal flow in the right portal vein, hepatopedal flow in the left portal and splenic veins, recanalized umbilical vein, and left and right hepatic veins not visualized.
Coarse echogenic liver, ascites, enlarged spleen (14.5 cm).
Narrowing of the intrahepatic portion of the inferior vena cava; hepatic veins not visualized.
